content.html: me: I don't want to think about computers or open source. I'm going to go shop for a dishwasher the dishwasher company: here is a 266-page PDF with a list of software packages and a printout of the GPL
content.value:
me: I don't want to think about computers or open source. I'm going to go shop for a dishwasher

the dishwasher company: here is a 266-page PDF with a list of software packages and a printout of the GPL
